warezcdn.name: Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei Bu Love!
warezcdn.title: Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu Love!

imdb.title: Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu Love!
imdb.plot: 5 boys in high school become magical boys and fight evil with the power of love when they meet a pink wombat from outer space.

episodes.title: Love, Once More!
episodes.plot: The Earth Defense Club is back together after a time-stopping monster appears at the bath house. Who could be behind this new sinister attack?

episodes.title: The Synchronicity of Love
episodes.plot: A hairy situation arises when a new set of twins arrives from Italy. Will the Beppu twins finally get rid of Yumoto once and for all?

episodes.title: Everyone Loves Someone!
episodes.plot: The rift between Io and Ryu has double in size, and the Earth Defense Club faces a brand new challenge. Can they survive as a trio?

episodes.title: A Christmas of Love and Miracles
episodes.plot: The Earth Defense Club decides to throw a Christmas Party at the bathhouse, and Gora invites the Beppu Twins. Will everyone get their Christmas wish?

episodes.title: Love Is Like the Snow
episodes.plot: New Years celebrations come to a halt when a frosty foe appears!

episodes.title: The Chemical Substance of Love
episodes.plot: After the Beppu Brothers' shocking revelation, the Earth Defense Club gives them the cold shoulder. After a month and a half of being snubbed, the twins set out to ruin Valentine's Day.

episodes.title: Days of Love and Acclaim
episodes.plot: A theme park from Yumoto's past is closing, and the Earth Defense Club treats him to one last trip down memory lane.

episodes.title: Love Will Save the Earth!
episodes.plot: Love takes center stage in the final confrontation between the Beppu Twins and the Earth Defense Club!

episodes.title: In the Name of Love
episodes.plot: It was a normal day like the others until Wombat fell (literally) from the sky. Then he asks the Earth Defense Club to fill the Earth with love and they can't do nothing to avoid their destiny.

episodes.title: Love Means Never Feeling Regret
episodes.plot: The Conquest Club reveals its plans for world domination while the Earth Defense Club shoots the breeze. This time, they fight a disposable chopstick monster!

episodes.title: Feel Love, Narcissus!
episodes.plot: The Defense Club members set their sights on winning the Handsome Man Contest! The competition is the ballet club faculty advisor?!

episodes.title: Cute Little Boys of Love and Youth
episodes.plot: A fellow student at Binan High resents looking mature and turns back the clock, turning the Battle Lovers into kids. Can the kid Battle Lovers defeat him?!

episodes.title: To Steal Love Without Regret
episodes.plot: The boys are hounded by a pesky reporter from the journalism club who is after their secret. Can they shake him off their trail and save the school?!

episodes.title: Love, Training Camp, and Toothbrushes
episodes.plot: The boys are at the beach, but where are all the girls? And who used Naruko's toothbrush? Can they solve the mysteries of the training camp?!

episodes.title: Love Wanders
episodes.plot: After a trip to the convenience store, Yufuin is mad at Kinugawa and won't talk to him. Can the others find the cause and stop their fighting?!

episodes.title: Love Is Stronger Than Pride
episodes.plot: Kusatsu is in a bad mood and sends a self-conscious melon monster to attack with riddles. How will the boys counter his introspection?!

episodes.title: Love Is Glasses...
episodes.plot: Yumoto gets sick and comes back wearing glasses and with a different personality. Can the boys get him back to normal and defeat the glasses monster?!

episodes.title: The Trial Called Love
episodes.plot: It's time for the Binan High School Festival, and the boys are making curry. But will a showdown with the conquest club expose their secret?!

episodes.title: Love Forever
episodes.plot: It's the final battle, and the boys finally find out the truth about their abilities. What new heights will they achieve as they fight the last boss?!
